response.overview: The seeds of love are planted when Lisa, a high-powered investment banker, receives flowers from a secret admirer. But when his fairy-tale fantasies clash with her workaholic ways, they soon find out that sometimes, it's harder than it seems for love to conquer all.
response.tagline: He gave her flowers. She gave him a chance.
response.title: Bed of Roses

titles.title: Amelia and the King of Plants

crew.name: Joe Fineman
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production
